com.percussion.services.assembly
Interface IPSAssemblyTemplate

All Superinterfaces:
IPSCatalogIdentifier, IPSCatalogItem, Serializable
public interface IPSAssemblyTemplate
extends IPSCatalogItem

A template combines a reference to a specific assembler, with information to be used in doing the assembly. A template is related to the content types and/or the content child types that it can assemble. It may also relate to zero or more slot finders as part of the bindings information, each of which can fill a slot in a template template.

Author:
dougrand

Nested Class Summary
static class IPSAssemblyTemplate.AAType
          Information about active assembly type, which is used when determining how to display active assembly controls in that mode.

          Defines values that dictate how the given template uses a global template.
static class IPSAssemblyTemplate.OutputFormat
          Output format indicates if this is a page, snippet or binary template
static class IPSAssemblyTemplate.PublishWhen
          Information used to determine when to publish this template for site folder publishing.
static class IPSAssemblyTemplate.TemplateType
          Template type indicates if this template is meant to be used with a single content type or across content types.

getName

String getName()
Get the user readable name of the template

Returns:

Returns:

getDescription

String getDescription()
Get a longer description suitable for end users to understand how this template is used

Returns:
a non-null, non-empty string

getAssembler

String getAssembler()
Get the assembler plugin extension name that should be used for this template. Legacy templates, i.e. variants, will return IPSExtension.LEGACY_ASSEMBLER for this value.

Returns:
the assembler, never null or empty.

getAssemblyUrl

String getAssemblyUrl()
Legacy assemblers store the url of the assembly request here. This will be deprecated in future releases and removed when the system no longer contains applications and resources.

Returns:
the url of the assembly request, null if undefined

getCharset

String getCharset()
Get the charset, which provides the character representation for character oriented mime types such as text/plain or text/html.

Returns:
the character set, may be null

getMimeType

String getMimeType()
Holds the default mimetype for this template.

Returns:
the mimetype may be null or empty

getStyleSheetPath

String getStyleSheetPath()
Get the stylesheet for old style templates

Returns:
the stylesheet or null if not defined

getTemplate

String getTemplate()
Get the default template text associated with this template. Any template may have text, and it may serve any purpose as input to the assembly process.

Returns:
the template, may be null or empty.

getLocationPrefix

String getLocationPrefix()
Get the location prefix, which is used when constructing assembly locations.

Returns:
the location prefix, may be null or empty

Returns:
the location suffix, may be null or empty

IPSAssemblyTemplate.AAType getActiveAssemblyType()
Get the active assembly type, which is used when determining whether to display the controls for active assembly in that preview mode.

Returns:
the type, never null

getOutputFormat

IPSAssemblyTemplate.OutputFormat getOutputFormat()
Gets the output format, a broad categorization of the kind of data this template produces.

Returns:
the output format, never null

getPublishWhen

IPSAssemblyTemplate.PublishWhen getPublishWhen()
Gets publish when, which indicates how this template participates in the SFP process.

Returns:
the publish when value, never null

getTemplateType

IPSAssemblyTemplate.TemplateType getTemplateType()
Gets the template type, which tells the caller if this is a shared or local template

Returns:
the template type, never null

getGlobalTemplateUsage

IPSAssemblyTemplate.GlobalTemplateUsage getGlobalTemplateUsage()
Gets the global template usage, which indicates if this template uses a global template and whether it defines the global template or uses the default template.

Returns:
the global template usage, never null

getGlobalTemplate

IPSGuid getGlobalTemplate()
Gets the global template guid if defined. The path is ignored if the global template usage is not IPSAssemblyTemplate.GlobalTemplateUsage.Defined.

Returns:
the global template path, or null if not defined.

getBindings

List<IPSTemplateBinding> getBindings()
Each binding represents a single piece of data to be made available to the assembly engine. The bindings are executed in order, with results from one binding available to the next execution through the JEXLContext.

More information on JEXL can be found on the Apache site under the Jakarta commons documentation.

Returns:
the bindings, may be null or empty

isVariant

boolean isVariant()
Templates can be based on either assembly plugins, or assembly applications. We term the ones based on applications variants for historical reasons.

Returns:
true if this template is a variant

setAssembler

void setAssembler(String assembler)
Set the assembler for use with this template

Parameters:
assembler - The assembler to set, never null or empty

setAssemblyUrl

void setAssemblyUrl(String assemblyUrl)
Set the assembly url, essentially for legacy use only. All templates will simply point to the main assembly servlet.

Parameters:
assemblyUrl - The assemblyUrl to set, never null or empty
